node.category: What is the way things are?
Should intelligence services be regulated more tightly by parliament?

node.surface: Intelligence services must urgently be regulated more tightly by parliament;

node.category: Why must intelligence services be regulated more tightly by parliament?

node.surface: this should be clear to everyone after the disclosures of Edward Snowden.

node.category: Are the disclosures of Edward Snowden relevant to Germany?

node.surface: Granted, those concern primarily the British and American intelligence services,
but the German services evidently do collaborate with them closely.

node.category: How did the German services collaborate with them?

node.surface: Their tools, data and expertise have been used to keep us under surveillance for a long time.
